article_title: Sunday Interview with Dr. Champ Baker: I try to listen and they'll tell you what's wrong
article_text: A skilled orthopedic surgeon, Champ Baker Jr., 67, has done more than 15,000 operations -- from shoulder to ankle -- during his time in the U.S. Army and the last three decades-plus at the Hughston Clinic in Columbus.
